title: Lowrance Hook Reveal 9 inch Fishfinders with Preloaded C-MAP Options
descriptions:
Lowrance HOOK Reveal 9 Inch Fishfinder with Preloaded C‑MAP Options

Hook more fish with the powerful combination of CHIRP clarity, detailed mapping, and a bright SolarMAX display. The Lowrance HOOK Reveal 9 is built to make finding and identifying fish easier than ever, whether you’re scanning structure, mapping new water, or fishing in bright sun.

Key features:
- FishReveal: Combines Lowrance CHIRP sonar separation with DownScan Imaging to make fish targets stand out, helping you distinguish fish from structure at a glance.
- TripleShot Transducer: All-in-one transducer delivers wide‑angle High CHIRP sonar plus SideScan and DownScan Imaging for high‑resolution views of fish and structure on both sides and directly beneath your boat.
- Autotuning Sonar: Automatically adjusts sonar settings as conditions change, giving you the best image without constant manual tweaking.
- High‑Detail Inland Maps: Preloaded coverage of nearly 4,000 U.S. inland lakes so you can hit the water with confidence.
- Genesis Live Mapping: Create custom, real‑time contour maps on your display to reveal unseen structure and refine your approach.
- 9" SolarMAX Display: Large, crisp screen with excellent clarity and daylight visibility, even in direct sunlight, for easy viewing from the helm or casting deck.

Why you’ll love it:
- Faster target recognition with FishReveal saves time and increases confidence.
- One transducer does it all—simpler installation and cleaner setup.
- Spend more time fishing and less time adjusting thanks to Autotuning Sonar.
- Navigate and scout effectively with robust preloaded maps and live mapping.
- Big, bright display ensures you won’t miss critical detail in any light.

What’s included:
- HOOK Reveal 9 display
- TripleShot transducer
- Preloaded C‑MAP inland mapping
- Mounting hardware and power cable
- Documentation

Perfect for anglers who want pro‑level sonar, intuitive operation, and exceptional visibility in a single, value‑packed unit.
